title: On-Stage TCM1900 Grip-On Universal Device Holder with U-Mount Mounting Post,Black
features: The ideal balance of ease and versatility
Try it anywhere! Mic stands, music stands, rec chairs, car headrests and more
Mounting post functions for typing or viewing videos
Compatible with standard 11-19mm round mic stand tubing. Perfect for reading sheet music, typing, and other activities.
Mounting Bar stays put while you're free to roam with your mobile device
Mounting Post doubles as a comfortable handle or a monopod to prop your mobile device upon desktops or other flat surfaces
Perfect for audio engineers, grade school teachers, AV presenters, and everyone in between
description: There are holders, and then there's the on-stage grip-on mounting system from on-stage! It's the fast and easy way to mount your mobile device to everyday objects and surfaces. The u-mount is the ideal balance of ease and hands-free convenience. Once you try the grip-on-mount holder, you'll want to use your mobile device everywhere!.
